ComicInfo.Summary:
MAD slam dunks the NBA, puts Prison Break in shackles and takes a shot at Dick Cheney! MAD also spoofsBrokeback Mountain, Taco Bell, the Grammys and much more. Plus, Spy vs. Spy and the Strip Club!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-12-11 23:08:32. [Issue ID 129299]
